name: Recipe app with dynamic content and reviews
description:
Buzzy lets you build working apps straight from Figma.


Create a live recipe app from Figma, with dynamic content and simple user reviews. No coding required! This file has been marked up with the Buzzy Figma plugin and is ready to publish.


Grab this file, install the plugin and hit publish - hey presto, you have a working app in a browser. Use this file as a reference for creating your own live app using Buzzy, straight from Figma.


New to Buzzy? Try the 'Getting Started' guides
